backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing monthly dashboards with CRUD operations and sorting by year and month.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence for dashboard autocomplete and refresh behaviors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to brief descriptions of their purpose in the dashboard app.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML root page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the dashboard page with theme support and notification toaster.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Center: Renders a grouped bar chart comparing revenue vs target per center for the selected month and year.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Coache: Editable table for managing coach rows with name, center autocomplete, salary inputs, and add/remove actions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Header displaying the app logo, title, and tagline.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Metric: Four metric cards showing revenue, target, total coach salaries, and salary output percentage.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Component for editing a monthly dashboard record, handling input validation, coach editing, and save/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/MonthS: Month input component for selecting a year-month value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
React-query hooks for fetching, saving, and deleting monthly dashboards using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup with custom light/dark themes and badminton-themed color utilities.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validation helpers for numbers, required fields, and YYYY-MM month format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page managing month selection, dashboard loading, local edit state, and save/delete logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, container settings, extended colors, animations, and fonts using OKLCH variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including current features, requirements, center-handling rules, and version metadata for the badminton-themed dashboard.
